result:
Security

Report vulnerability

At Openbook, we are committed to security. While we employ secure product development practices in our engineering process, we recognize that not all vulnerabilities may be avoided. We will provide a quick response for all potential vulnerabilities.

Please include

  • A detailed description of the security vulnerability
  • IP addresses, logs and screenshots
  • Instructions on how to reproduce the security vulnerability

Use one of the following methods to report a potential security vulnerability:

  • Send an encrypted email to security@open-book.org using our PGP key found below. Alternatively, you can retrieve the public PGP key from pgp.mit.edu.
  • Send us a message using our contact form.

Thank you for being a cyber-hero!
